name: com.android.settings.AppWidgetPickActivity
description: Displays a list of AppWidgetProviderInfo widgets, along with any injected special widgets specified through AppWidgetManager#EXTRA_CUSTOM_INFO and AppWidgetManager#EXTRA_CUSTOM_EXTRAS. When an installed AppWidgetProviderInfo is selected, this activity will bind it to the given AppWidgetManager#EXTRA_APPWIDGET_ID, otherwise it will return the requested extras.
